alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Las Animas County through 500 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Branson to 7 miles southeast of Hoehne to near Trinidad. Movement was south to southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Cokedale, Branson, Starkville, Raton Pass, Hoehne and Trinchera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
